name: BathomaticX
0:
”Alexa, ask bathomatic X to set water level to 50 percent”
”Alexa, ask bathomatic X to fill the bathtub”
”Alexa, ask bathomatic X to set temperature unit to celsius”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bathomatic x.
des: This skill allows users of Bath-o-matic smart bathroom system to use voice commands instead of web interface when managing their bathtubs.
